languages.text: {n}Культист провел дни без сна и пищи, изучая каждую рану на изувеченных трупах. Неумирающий даровал ему откровение: ткач ощутил предсмертные страдания жертв и изрек, что темный нелюдь забрал души несчастных. Искалеченный открывшимися видениями, ткач утратил разум и бессвязно повторял мрачные, полные загадочных образов пророчества об ужасном враге. Но долг его был исполнен, и мятеж угас — страх перед неведомым врагом сплотил обитателей колонии.{/n}

{n}The cultist spent days without sleep or sustenance, studying every wound on the mutilated corpses. At last, the Undying One bestowed a revelation on him: the spinner sensed the victims' dying throes and proclaimed that a dark entity had claimed the souls of the convicts. Crippled by his visions, the man lost his mind and kept rambling, spouting gloomy prophecies of the terrible adversary. But his duty was done, and the rebellion abated as fear of the unknown rallied the inhabitants of the colony.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Культист провел дни без сна и пищи, изучая каждую рану на изувеченных трупах. Неумирающий даровал ему откровение: ткач ощутил предсмертные страдания жертв и изрек, что темный нелюдь забрал души несчастных. Искалеченный открывшимися видениями, ткач утратил разум и бессвязно повторял мрачные, полные загадочных образов пророчества об ужасном враге. Но долг его был исполнен, и мятеж угас — страх перед неведомым врагом сплотил обитателей колонии.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cultist spent days without sleep or sustenance, studying every wound on the mutilated corpses. The Undying One bestowed a revelation on him. The weaver sensed the victims' dying throes and proclaimed that a dark entity had claimed the souls of the unfortunate convicts. Crippled by his visions, the man lost his mind and kept rambling, spouting gloomy prophecies of the terrible adversary. But his duty was done, and the rebellion abated as fear of the unknown rallied the inhabitants of the colony.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Kultist hat tagelang nicht gegessen und geschlafen, um jede einzelne Wunde der verstümmelten Leichen zu untersuchen. Schließlich gewährte ihm der Todlose eine Offenbarung: die Spinner spürten den Todesschmerz der Opfer und verkündeten, dass eine dunkle Wesenheit die Seelen der Häftlinge geholt habe. Angesichts seiner Visionen verlor der Mann den Verstand und murmelte nur noch düstere Prophezeiungen hinsichtlich des schrecklichen Widersachers. Aber seine Pflicht war erfüllt und die Rebellion flaute ab, als die Furcht vor dem Unbekannten die Bewohner der Kolonie vereinte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist spent days without sleep or sustenance, studying every wound on the mutilated corpses. At last, the Undying One bestowed a revelation on him: the spinner sensed the victims' dying throes and proclaimed that a dark entity had claimed the souls of the convicts. Crippled by his visions, the man lost his mind and kept rambling, spouting gloomy prophecies of the terrible adversary. But his duty was done, and the rebellion abated as fear of the unknown rallied the inhabitants of the colony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kultist hat tagelang nicht gegessen und geschlafen, um jede einzelne Wunde der verstümmelten Leichen zu untersuchen. Schließlich gewährte ihm der Todlose eine Offenbarung: die Spinner spürten den Todesschmerz der Opfer und verkündeten, dass eine dunkle Wesenheit die Seelen der Häftlinge geholt habe. Angesichts seiner Visionen verlor der Mann den Verstand und murmelte nur noch düstere Prophezeiungen hinsichtlich des schrecklichen Widersachers. Aber seine Pflicht war erfüllt und die Rebellion flaute ab, als die Furcht vor dem Unbekannten die Bewohner der Kolonie vereinte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le cultiste a passé des jours sans manger ni dormir, à étudier chacune des lésions présentes sur les corps mutilés, jusqu'à ce que l'Immortel lui accorde enfin une révélation : témoin des derniers instants des victimes, le tisseur a vu de ses yeux la sombre entité qui a emporté leurs âmes. Meurtri par ses visions, l'homme a perdu la tête et s'est mis à divaguer, débitant de sinistres prophéties à propos de ce terrible adversaire. Pour autant, il a accompli sa mission, et la rébellion s'est éteinte à mesure que la peur de l'inconnu gagnait les habitants de la colonie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist spent days without sleep or sustenance, studying every wound on the mutilated corpses. At last, the Undying One bestowed a revelation on him: the spinner sensed the victims' dying throes and proclaimed that a dark entity had claimed the souls of the convicts. Crippled by his visions, the man lost his mind and kept rambling, spouting gloomy prophecies of the terrible adversary. But his duty was done, and the rebellion abated as fear of the unknown rallied the inhabitants of the colony.{/n}

Meurtri par ses visions, l'homme a perdu la tête et s'est mis à divaguer, débitant de sinistres prophéties à propos de ce terrible adversaire. Pour autant, il a accompli sa mission, et la rébellion s'est éteinte à mesure que la peur de l'inconnu gagnait les habitants de la colonie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cultista pasó días sin dormir ni comer, estudiando cada herida de los cadáveres mutilados. Al fin, recibió una revelación del Inmortal: el tejedor sintió los estertores de las víctimas y proclamó que un ser oscuro se había cobrado las almas de los prisioneros. Asolado por las visiones, perdió la cordura y continuó proclamando profecías macabras sobre el terrible enemigo. Pero había cumplido su deber y la rebelión cesó cuando el miedo a lo desconocido unió a los habitantes de la colonia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist spent days without sleep or sustenance, studying every wound on the mutilated corpses. At last, the Undying One bestowed a revelation on him: the spinner sensed the victims' dying throes and proclaimed that a dark entity had claimed the souls of the convicts. Crippled by his visions, the man lost his mind and kept rambling, spouting gloomy prophecies of the terrible adversary. But his duty was done, and the rebellion abated as fear of the unknown rallied the inhabitants of the colony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cultista pasó días sin dormir ni comer, estudiando cada herida de los cadáveres mutilados. Al fin, recibió una revelación del Inmortal: el tejedor sintió los estertores de las víctimas y proclamó que un ser oscuro se había cobrado las almas de los prisioneros. Asolado por las visiones, perdió la cordura y continuó proclamando profecías macabras sobre el terrible enemigo. Pero había cumplido su deber y la rebelión cesó cuando el miedo a lo desconocido unió a los habitantes de la colonia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}カルト教団信者は何日も不眠不休で切り刻まれた死体のあらゆる傷を調査した。ついに不死の者が彼に啓示を与えた。スピナーは犠牲者の死に至る際の苦しみを感じ取り、闇の存在が囚人たちの魂を奪ったのだと明言した。幻視によって自由を失ったものは正気をも失い、恐ろしい敵に関する陰鬱な予言を口走り続ける。しかし彼の義務は果たされた。未知なるものへの恐怖がコロニーの住民たちを結集させ、反乱は治まったのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist spent days without sleep or sustenance, studying every wound on the mutilated corpses. At last, the Undying One bestowed a revelation on him: the spinner sensed the victims' dying throes and proclaimed that a dark entity had claimed the souls of the convicts. Crippled by his visions, the man lost his mind and kept rambling, spouting gloomy prophecies of the terrible adversary. But his duty was done, and the rebellion abated as fear of the unknown rallied the inhabitants of the colony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カルト教団信者は何日も不眠不休で切り刻まれた死体のあらゆる傷を調査した。ついに不死の者が彼に啓示を与えた。スピナーは犠牲者の死に至る際の苦しみを感じ取り、闇の存在が囚人たちの魂を奪ったのだと明言した。幻視によって自由を失ったものは正気をも失い、恐ろしい敵に関する陰鬱な予言を口走り続ける。しかし彼の義務は果たされた。未知なるものへの恐怖がコロニーの住民たちを結集させ、反乱は治まったのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这位教徒几天几夜不吃东西、不睡觉，仔细研究残损尸体上的每个伤口。到了最后，不死之神赐予了他启示。他亲身感受到了那些受害者临终前的痛苦，查明了真相——那些囚犯的灵魂落入了某个邪恶之物的手中。由于受到了幻觉的影响，那位教徒发了疯，一直在胡言乱语，滔滔不绝地重复着关于可怕敌人的恐怖预言。不过即便如此，他也完成了他的职责。殖民地所有居民心中充满了对未知的恐惧，叛乱也戛然而止。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist spent days without sleep or sustenance, studying every wound on the mutilated corpses. At last, the Undying One bestowed a revelation on him: the spinner sensed the victims' dying throes and proclaimed that a dark entity had claimed the souls of the convicts. Crippled by his visions, the man lost his mind and kept rambling, spouting gloomy prophecies of the terrible adversary. But his duty was done, and the rebellion abated as fear of the unknown rallied the inhabitants of the colony.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tarikatçı; günlerini uyumayıp yemeden geçirdi, parçalanmış cesetlerdeki her bir yarayı inceledi. En nihayetinde Ölmeyen, ona bir vahiy bahşetti: Dokur, kurbanların ölüm çığlıklarını hissedip karanlık bir varlığın, mahkûmların ruhlarını ele geçirdiğini duyurdu. Görüleri yüzünden kendini kaybeden adam, aklını yitirip korkunç düşmanla ilgili kasvetli kehanetlerde bulunarak saçmalamayı sürdürdü. Ancak vazifesini yerine getirmişti ve bilinmeyene duyulan korkunun koloni sakinlerini bir araya getirmesiyle isyan dindi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist spent days without sleep or sustenance, studying every wound on the mutilated corpses. At last, the Undying One bestowed a revelation on him: the spinner sensed the victims' dying throes and proclaimed that a dark entity had claimed the souls of the convicts. Crippled by his visions, the man lost his mind and kept rambling, spouting gloomy prophecies of the terrible adversary. But his duty was done, and the rebellion abated as fear of the unknown rallied the inhabitants of the colony.{/n}
